title: @Riot No lvl 6 0r 7 masteries for me ( i think )
body: i got a week suspension for "feeding" and because of this I'm not able to get hextech chest from games and without hextech chest i can't get blue essence and without blue essence i can't get my lvl 6 or 7 masteries rito why? is there any way for me to start getting rewards again? {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I know that we're planning to add a mystery champ item to the store that won't be specifically from chests, but don't know yet whether or not it will be completely outside the Hextech Crafting system. In general though, if you show consistently good behavior, you'll regain eligibility for Hextech Crafting so the option is not gone forever!
